title: Explain How did you choose your Summoner's name
body: Since in the Thread i did about assumptions, a lot of people said how "none understand what is their names"

replies.body:
Hm, nope, name doesnt ring any bells for references...

none whatsoever
I guess we have _short_ memories.
bruh

"Making evil look exquisite is indeed my forte" ~ http://www.mobafire.com/images/champion/skins/landscape/veigar-superb-villain.jpg


Such jolly good sport, wouldn't you say, old chap? :)

Indubitably.

Evil demands a certain level of refinement to be properly enjoyed.
um... many things happened

I'm the most evil thing on the planet, I despise every single human being and every action I take is to cause harm and suffering.
And I like Metal.

A recipe for disaster

Shh...
I need to live up to my name damnit!

It's kinda embarrassing..
I main one of the most evil champions in the game and try to spread happiness and be generally a decent fellow.
I suck at choosing fitting names.

> It's kinda embarrassing..
> I main one of the most **evil champions in the game** and try to spread happiness and be generally a decent fellow.

I wonder what position that puts me in

I dunno.
Though I know I love to fish, soo....

~~run.~~
http://www.hilariousgifs.com/i/7qIYMrT.gif

Well...i like Morde and i suck at this game

https://media.giphy.com/media/g57vtCnpnEuYM/giphy.gif
I like to pew.

My dad and I used to play a game called "Gauntlet: Seven Sorrows". He named his character "Quantis" (something he made up on the spot). I thought that was a pretty cool sounding name. Years later, I was playing Skyrim with the Dawnguard DLC. In the Soul Cairn, you meet a dragon named Durnehviir, and when you defeat him he calls you ""Qahnaarin" which means "Vanquisher". Hearing that word/name reminded me of the beastly character my dad would play as. I had no idea how it was spelt, so I kinda fused the two names together and gave my own spelling. But that is the inspiration for my name. :) "Quannari"

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/8Kl8Sn9qs8U/hqdefault.jpg

Seriously, he was a hardcore and unique dragon. Tried practicing necromancy, got tricked by the Ideal Masters and from sheer exposure to the Soul Carin, transmutes into a "zombie" dragon who can summon the undead in Tamriel.
I don't think mine requires much explanation.
When I first created my account, I called myself MoonMoon95 (Because I had no idea what to call myself lol). Then I changed it because I enjoyed playing the heretic a lot. :P

Heretic Lunari is MoonMoon

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/534/248/7f5.jpg
Bwahahahaha
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/534/062/1c1.jpg
A painful experience from my past.

It makes me happy when things die.

Also, Sion.

My original internet name was "IronBeast" but my friends started calling me Fe so i just changed it to FeBeast

that being said, i kinda want to change to fit a Sona main.
Cause I'm just some random redneck.
well you see...
Wanted everyone to know I'm a scumbag.
I lost a bet.

I was getting annoyed because as a jungle main every one expected me to win their lanes for them. For a while i would say to my friends "Im not your maid, dont make me clean up your messes." Then after a while I just owned up to it.

Also i like anime.

Random name generator
I don't trust myself enough to name things properly

I tried bill. 
It was taken. 
I tried billx. 
It's was taken. 
I tried billxx. 
HUZZAH
I thought when you got a kill the game would announce "[summoner name] has slain an enemy". I tried to make a joke of it by saying "I have actually slain an enemy"  but that was already taken...

It's my go to username that also happens to share my initials IRL :p

I also like Wolfs .__.

 https://media.giphy.com/media/CvgezXSuQTMTC/giphy.gif
Can I get a free car? ;p
Are you kidding? Do you even know how much I cost? I'm ridiculously expensive O_o

Exactly.
No way in hell I can afford you normally. XD
Puella Magi Madoka Magica episode 12. T_T
i play alot of a specific champion
Im the OG GANGSTER SHEEP! The one and only! {{champion:203}}
Am a support main and my name is robin so....

I like penguins
people don't realize penguins live in the tropics, such as the Galapagos penguin 
it triggers me a bit

Way back in the day, like grades 3-4, I used to play games with my friends at school in the "computer lab". Back then I hadn't really started playing online games and stuck to playing Pokémon and watching tv shows. 

One of the tv shows I used to watch was Chaotic, if any of you know that show. It really was awesome seeing all those creatures and things fight, and the idea of a second world that you experience while you like your life was FUCKING AWSOME. 

One day my friends brought up a game to me called Club Penguin, and in order to 'fit in' I guess, I decided to get an account. Realizing I couldn't ( or maybe shouldn't) use my real name like I used to in all my Pokémon games, I decided to go along with one of the names of the characters from the show, 'Kas'. The problem with club penguin is that the name was too short, and in all my 9 or however year old intelligence, I wanted to use something that rhymed, I went with "Kasfas". ( it was meant to be pronounced Kazfaz, but EVERYONE got it wrong, so I kinda gave up on that). 

And that's pretty much the username I've used for everything since then.
{{champion:45}}
My current SN was born in irony since I was pretty new to League, and not that great at playing whatsoever when I came up with it.
Mordekaiser + Deadpool= Mordepool  have had it since season 1 back when noone knew who deadpool was

Sypher was a combination of Samus from Metroid and Cipher as in a computer Cipher due to my love of computers.

Originally it was Sypher40 from the number I had in baseball but changed it once I hit 200K points on Riven.

I also got the coveted Exile tag, the club filled up in 10 minutes. :P
Mine is referencing the seven layers of hell where my soul eternally burns :3
i dont know how to explain...
I was thinking of a name for a waw custom zombie map i was making, and i came up with matarra. Now its my summoner name. Also im making a kingdom hearts themed waw custom zombies map.
XC stands for Cross Country and I always start my run with "Get Jinxed"
